promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a massive epic frilled-lizard water-type with a white and black tail. It can be found in ocean-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or frilled-lizard. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Nebulisk, a massive epic frilled-lizard water-type pokemon. It can be found in ocean-like environments It has the following abilities: aqua-tail. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word frilled-lizard or water or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, frilled-lizard-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, sparkling blue background
generatedDescription: Nebulisk, a majestic aquatic dweller. Exploring its watery home in oceans, searching the depths for new discoveries.
